quotes: the CGI dissolution policy had been started since last year.
In 2006 the Consultative Group on Indonesia pledged $5.4 billion in fresh loans and grants for Indonesia.
Established in 1992, the CGI was a consortium of countries and institutions providing loans to Indonesia, set up by the Indonesian government and the World Bank.

organizations.name: CGI
quotes: the CGI dissolution policy had been started since last year.
Established in 1992, the CGI was a consortium of countries and institutions providing loans to Indonesia, set up by the Indonesian government and the World Bank.

the Consultative Group on Indonesia (CGI) was no longer needed as the country's primary creditors were only the World Bank, the Asian Development Bank (ADB) and Japan, and that Indonesia now preferred one-on-one negotiations rather than round table, multilateral ones.

Iman Sugema, director of the International Center for Applied Finance and Economics (Inter-CAFE) at the Bogor Institute of Agriculture (IPB), applauded the president's plan to dissolve the CGI and said the CGI had not benefited Indonesia because the donor countries often put too many demands on the nation.

In 2006 the Consultative Group on Indonesia pledged $5.4 billion in fresh loans and grants for Indonesia.

Iman Sugema, director of the International Center for Applied Finance and Economics (Inter-CAFE) at the Bogor Institute of Agriculture (IPB), applauded the president's plan to dissolve the CGI and said the CGI had not benefited Indonesia because the donor countries often put too many demands on the nation.

The Yudhoyono administration also strives to ensure that all Indonesians are protected through national social security, which can improve the welfare and protection of Indonesians in the areas of health and old-age security.
